title: Actionable Plans
description: All plans must be actionable, schema-compliant, logical, sound, and manifest-compliant when created.
rules: Plans must validate against the current schema
Plans must reference valid, existing capabilities
Plans must include proper input/output specifications
Plans must be executable without manual intervention
examples: Validating plans against JSON schema before execution
Checking for circular dependencies in plan steps
Verifying that all referenced verbs exist in the system
Ensuring proper input/output chaining between steps
Implementing fallback steps for critical operations
exceptions: Dynamically generated plans that require runtime validation
Experimental plan structures for testing new capabilities
